statements: SELECT * FROM Blockchain_Consensus_Algorithm
SELECT blockchain_id, block_hash FROM Blockchain_Consensus_Algorithm ORDER BY replication_factor DESC
SELECT * FROM Blockchain_Consensus_Algorithm WHERE replication_factor > 3
SELECT block_data FROM Blockchain_Consensus_Algorithm WHERE block_hash = 'abc123'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Blockchain_Consensus_Algorithm
SELECT * FROM Blockchain_Consensus_Algorithm WHERE replication_factor > 2;
SELECT blockchain_id, block_hash FROM Blockchain_Consensus_Algorithm WHERE replication_factor = 3 ORDER BY block_hash DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT replication_factor FROM Blockchain_Consensus_Algorithm;
SELECT block_hash, block_data->'timestamp' AS timestamp FROM Blockchain_Consensus_Algorithm WHERE replication_factor >= 2 ORDER BY timestamp ASC, block_hash DESC;
SELECT * FROM Blockchain_Consensus_Algorithm WHERE replication_factor <= 4 AND replication_factor != 3 ORDER BY replication_factor ASC, block_hash DESC;
SELECT * FROM consensus_algorithm;
SELECT node_id, block_id FROM consensus_algorithm ORDER BY consensus_timestamp DESC;
SELECT node_id, block_id, consensus_timestamp FROM consensus_algorithm WHERE node_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_replication ORDER BY replica_timestamp ASC;
SELECT block_id, replica_timestamp FROM blockchain_replication WHERE node_id = 2 ORDER BY replica_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM consensus_algorithm WHERE node_id = 1;
SELECT node_id, consensus_timestamp FROM blockchain_replication ORDER BY replica_timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT node_id, COUNT(block_id) FROM blockchain_replication GROUP BY node_id;
SELECT * FROM consensus_algorithm WHERE consensus_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT node_id, block_id, replica_timestamp FROM blockchain_replication WHERE block_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM consensus_algorithm;
SELECT algorithm_name, replication_factor FROM consensus_algorithm WHERE id = 1;
SELECT block_id, block_hash, timestamp FROM blockchain ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, block_size FROM scalability WHERE shard_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM consensus_algorithm WHERE replication_factor >= 3;
SELECT * FROM consensus_algorithm WHERE replication_factor > 3;
SELECT algorithm_name, replication_factor FROM consensus_algorithm WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT block_id, block_hash, timestamp FROM blockchain ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, block_id, block_size FROM scalability WHERE shard_id = 2 AND block_size IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM consensus_algorithm JOIN scalability ON consensus_algorithm.id = scalability.id WHERE block_size > 1000;
SELECT * FROM consensus_algorithm;
SELECT id, block_number, consensus_status FROM consensus_algorithm WHERE block_number > 100;
SELECT node_name, node_status FROM blockchain_node WHERE node_status = 'active';
SELECT log_id, transaction_id, replication_status FROM replication_log ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT metric_id, timestamp, transaction_count, block_size FROM scalability_metrics WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM consensus_algorithm WHERE block_number > 100;
SELECT node_name, node_status FROM blockchain_node ORDER BY node_id DESC;
SELECT log_id, replication_status FROM replication_log WHERE log_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT node_name, node_status FROM blockchain_node WHERE node_status = 'active';
SELECT consensus_status, block_number FROM consensus_algorithm WHERE block_number BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM consensus_algorithm ORDER BY algorithm_name ASC;
SELECT block_id, transaction_id, transaction_data FROM block_transactions WHERE block_id = 10;
SELECT validator_id, public_key FROM validators WHERE total_votes > 100 ORDER BY validator_id DESC;
SELECT block_id, previous_block_id, block_data, timestamp FROM blockchain_blocks WHERE TIMESTAMP > '2021-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM node_status WHERE is_active = TRUE ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM validators WHERE total_votes > 100 ORDER BY validator_id ASC;
SELECT block_data, timestamp FROM blockchain_blocks WHERE block_id = 10;
SELECT node_id, last_updated FROM node_status WHERE is_active = true;
SELECT algorithm_name, replication_factor FROM consensus_algorithm WHERE replication_factor BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY replication_factor DESC;
SELECT block_id, previous_block_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM block_transactions GROUP BY block_id HAVING transaction_count > 5 ORDER BY block_id ASC;
